Desc.entry: A group of people living on Albert, Shirebrook and Kent Roads in Heeley, Sheffield 8. Aims to act locally about climate change at the same time as enjoying working together as a community. Shares practical ways to make group members homes more energy efficient, runs a composting scheme, has a list of tools and other resources within the group and helps members on gardens and allotments. Holds social events such as a harvest supper, Easter bike ride and summer solstice walk and bonfire. Anyone living on these roads is welcome to join or if anyone seeks to set up their own local group, Green Triangle can offer advice.
